CustomField.formula: CASE( StageName, "R - Renewals", 1, "0 - Open", 2, "1 - Qualification", 3, "2 - Discovery", 4, "3 - Technical Evaluation", 5, "4 - Business Evaluation", 6, "5 - Legal/Procurement", 7, "6 - Signature", 8, "7W - Closed Won", 9, "7L - Closed Lost", 0, "Duplicate", 0, "DQ - Disqualified", 0, "0 - Generate Interest", 0, "1 - Qualify Opportunity", 1, "2 - Develop Opportunity", 2, "3 - Present Solution", 3, "4 - Closing", 4, "5 - Sales Closed Won",5, null )
CustomField.label: Stage Number
